    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship()
        Constructs a Ship Class. Ship Class major component is a type of JPanel. By default the ship is of type 1 which is one square of size (50x50px).

    • Method Detail

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()
        Returns:
        how many squares of space current ship allocates in x axis.

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Returns:
        how many squares of space current ship allocates in y axis.

      • getColor

        public Color getColor()
        Returns:
        RGB color value of current ship

      • getShipType

        public int getShipType()
        Returns:
        current ship type. Can be 1,2,4,6 or 8.

      • getSquareSize

        public int getSquareSize()
        Returns:
        how many pixels does one square allocate.

      • getShip

        public JPanel getShip()
        Returns:
        returns a JPanel (this Ship class).

      • buildShip

        public void buildShip(int type)
        Builds a ship of given type as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        type - many squares of space ship takes on a board grid. Valid values(1,2,4,6,8) defaults to 1
